<< Contents: Q8. Summary Table: Which of the following do you think could help a child stay safe online?
Teaching children about Online Safety at school
Talking to child about Online Safety by parents/guardians
Encouraging children to speak to a trusted adult (e.g. teacher or a parent) about their concerns
Making use of parental controls (e.g. on platforms, devices, Wi-Fi)
Blocking contact from people they don't know online
Blocking downloading of apps that are not age-appropriate
Reporting inappropriate content to a trusted organisation (e.g. school, charity helplines, police)
Never sharing passwords with other people
Using in-platform reporting tools (e.g. Instagram Report)
